name: llmswap
summary: Python SDK + CLI for any AI provider. Build apps without vendor lock-in (SDK) or use from terminal (CLI). Works with existing subscriptions: OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Cohere, Perplexity, IBM watsonx, Groq, Together AI. Features: Teaching-first AI (Eklavya mentorship), automatic cost optimization (50-90% savings), age-appropriate explanations, provider switching. One tool, two ways: from llmswap import LLMClient (SDK) or llmswap chat (CLI). Alternative to Claude Code, Gemini CLI, GitHub Copilot.
